headerText: The `v-file-input` component is a specialized input that provides a clean interface for selecting files, showing detailed selection information and upload progress.

usage.desc: The `v-file-input` is a basic container for collecting and displaying information on user selected files.

multiple.desc: The `v-file-input` Can contain multiple files at the same time.

accept.desc: `v-file-input` component can accept only specific media formats/file types if you want. For more information, checkout the documentation on the [accept attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/file#accept).

chips.desc: A selected file can be displayed as a [chip](/components/chips). When using the **chips** and **multiple** props, each chip will be displayed (as opposed to the file count).

size.desc: The displayed size of the selected file(s) can be configured with the **display-size** property.

counter.desc: When using the **display-size** property along with **counter**, the total number of files and size will be displayed..

scoped-slots.desc: Using the `selection` scoped slot, you can customize the appearance of your input selections.

custom-icon.desc: The `v-file-input` has a default prepended icon that can be set on the component or adjusted globally. More information on changing global components can be found on the [customizing icons page](/customizing/icons).

validation.desc: Using the **rules** prop you can create your own custom validation parameters.

advanced.desc: The flexibility of the selection slot allows you accomodate complex use-cases.

props.accept: One or more [unique file type specifiers](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/file#Unique_file_type_specifiers) describing file types to allow.
props.counterSizeString: The text displayed when using the **counter** and **display-size** props. Can also be customizing globally in [Internationalization](/customization/internationalization).
props.counterString: The text displayed when using the **counter** prop. Can also be customizing globally in [Internationalization](/customization/internationalization).
props.displaySize: Sets the displayed size of selected file(s). When using **true** will default to _base=1000_ displaying (**kB, MB, GB**) while _base=1024_ will display (**KiB, MiB, GiB**).
props.multiple: Adds the **multiple** attribute to the input, allowing multiple file selections.

scopedSlots.selection: Slot for defining a custom appearance for selected item(s).
